roleset.name: approve of loudly

example.name: acclaim-v: usually just transitive
example.text: On Oct. 3 , following conversations with Secretary of State James Baker , Soviet Foreign Minister Eduard Shevardnadze arrived in Managua to acclaim `` Nicaragua 's great peace efforts . ''

example.name: unk
example.text: From her early career in advertising , to taking up her late husband 's unfulfilled wishes and setting out on the road of political no - return , Yeh Chu - lan has fought impressively , earning wide acclaim .

example.name: acclaim-v: passive
example.text: The series was critically acclaimed for its thoughtful and intense treatment of difficult issues .

propbank.arg: for its thoughtful and intense treatment of difficult issues

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: On Oct. 3 , following conversations with Secretary of State James Baker , Soviet Foreign Minister Eduard Shevardnadze arrived in Managua to acclaim `` Nicaragua 's great peace efforts . ''

example.name: acclaim-n: Args 0; 2
example.text: The author has won the acclaim of critics nationwide for her complex , suspenseful legal thrillers .

propbank.arg: for her complex , suspenseful legal thrillers

roleset.note: ACCLAIM-V NOTES: Verbnet entry judgement-33.1-1-1, Framenet entry Judgement_communication. (from acclaim.01-v)
ACCLAIM-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry acclaim.01, OntoNotes acclaim-n grouping sense 1; maps to VN entry judgement-33. Framed by Claire. (from acclaim.01-n)
Usually the cause and the acclaimed party are merged, as in the first example. (from acclaim.01-v)
